Source code for base.models

from django.db import models
from django.contrib.auth.models import AbstractUser





[docs]class User(AbstractUser):

    """User Class"""
    
    name = models.CharField(max_length=200, null=True)
    email = models.EmailField(unique=True, null=True)  
    bio = models.TextField(null=True)

    avatar = models.ImageField(null=True, default="avatar.svg")


    USERNAME_FIELD = 'email'
    # EMAIL_FIELD = 'email'
    REQUIRED_FIELDS =  ['username'] # added username, for super user

    # ask for email and then ask for two passwords



[docs]class Topic(models.Model):
    """Topic Class"""


    name = models.CharField(max_length=200)

    def __str__(self):
        return self.name




[docs]class Room(models.Model):
    """Room Class"""

    host = models.ForeignKey(User, on_delete=models.SET_NULL, null=True)
    topic = models.ForeignKey(Topic, on_delete=models.SET_NULL, null=True)
    name = models.CharField(max_length=200)
    description = models.TextField(null=True, blank=True)
    participants = models.ManyToManyField(
        User, related_name='participants', blank=True)
    updated = models.DateTimeField(auto_now=True)
    created = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)

    class Meta:
        ordering = ['-updated', '-created']

    def __str__(self):
        return self.name




[docs]class Message(models.Model):
    """Message Class"""

    user = models.ForeignKey(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    room = models.ForeignKey(Room, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    body = models.TextField()
    updated = models.DateTimeField(auto_now=True)
    created = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)

    class Meta:
        ordering = ['-updated', '-created']

    def __str__(self):
        return self.body[0:50]
